simplesect.title: Brief Description
simplesect.para: TIM Time Base Init structure definition.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This structure is used with all TIMx except for TIM6 and TIM7.

simplesect.title: uint16_t TIM_Prescaler
simplesect.para: Specifies the prescaler value used to divide the TIM clock. This parameter can be a number between 0x0000 and 0xFFFF

simplesect.title: uint32_t TIM_Period
simplesect.para: Specifies the period value to be loaded into the active Auto-Reload Register at the next update event. This parameter must be a number between 0x0000 and 0xFFFF.

simplesect.title: uint8_t TIM_RepetitionCounter
simplesect.para:
Specifies the repetition counter value. Each time the RCR downcounter reaches zero, an update event is generated and counting restarts from the RCR value (N). This means in PWM mode that (N+1) corresponds to:
the number of PWM periods in edge-aligned mode
the number of half PWM period in center-aligned mode This parameter must be a number between 0x00 and 0xFF. Note:
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
